vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
γρηγορ-έω,
late present, formed from perfect ἐγρήγορα (which see), to be or become fully awake, watch, [LXX+NT+3rd c.AD+]; ἐπὶ τὰς πόλεις[LXX]passive, ἐγρηγορήθη ἐπὶ τὰ ἀσεβήματά μου[LXX]; opposed to καθεύδω, of life opposed to death, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to keep watch, be on guard
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to keep watch, be on guard
to be awake, to watch, Mt. 26:38, 40, 41; Mk. 14:34; 37, 38; to be alive, 1Thess. 5:10; metaphorically to be watchful, attentive, vigilant, circumspect, on guard Mt. 25:13; Mk. 13:35, et al.
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estar despierto o mantenerse despierto ; vigilar, cuidar, estar alerta ; estar vivo (1TE.5:6)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:

2) 戒備
3) 活著 (帖前 5:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 提高警觉
